mapper.select: select a.log_id as logId, a.file_name as fileName, a.service_id as serviceId, a.acct_month as month, a.state as status, a.file_seq as fileSeq, to_char(a.create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mm:ss') as createDate, to_char(a.import_date,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mm:ss') as importDate from rpt_sett_service_log a where acct_month = #{month}
